content: Hi everyone! Looking to sell this original 1 of 1 hand painted and blood ink soaked modified authentic USA note by MVDEXEach Note in this series is an original 1/1 created on authentic FIAT currencies from around the world.Comes with the magnetic acrylic frame and display standPrice .005BTC shipping on me. PM if interested
